    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]

                 "sample: fixpoint 1"

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")

    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine u -> pi *. (eval (u, x, y))
  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)
      else eval (v, x, y);;

  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

  if depth = 1
  then (if (rand (0, 1)) = 0 then VarX else VarY)
  else
    (match rand (0, 4) with
     | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 2 ->
         Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 4 ->

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = match l with
  | []    -> d
  | h::t  -> if (fst h) = k then snd h else assoc (d, k, t);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b', c') = f b in
    if c' = true then wwhile(f,b') else b'


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let fixpoint (f,b) = wwhile ((fun b -> (f b, (f b) != b)) , b);;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y" 
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Average (x,y) -> "(("  ^ exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (x,y) -> exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) -> "(" ^ exprToString a ^ "<" ^ exprToString b 
                        ^ "?" ^ exprToString c ^ ":" ^ exprToString d

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine u -> pi *. eval (u,x,y) 
  | Cosine u ->  cos (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) +. (eval (v,x,y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) *. (eval (v,x,y)))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) -> if (eval (s,x,y)) < (eval (t,x,y)) 
      then eval (u,x,y) 
      else eval (v,x,y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in

  let _ =

          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);

    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"

  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->

              ((exprToString b) ^
                 ("?" ^ ((exprToString c) ^ (":" ^ (exprToString d)))))));;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth = 1
  then (if (rand (0, 1)) = 0 then VarX else VarY)
  else
    (match rand (0, 4) with
     | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 2 ->
         Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 4 ->
         Thresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) = let rv = eval (e, x, y) in rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Average (x,y) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (x,y) -> (exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString a) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString b) ^
                 ("?" ^ ((exprToString c) ^ (":" ^ (exprToString d)))))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Printf.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let g1 () = (2, 47, 6);;

let _ = (fun ()  -> doRandomGray (g1 ())) ();;

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine u -> pi *. (eval (u, x, y))
  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)
      else eval (v, x, y);;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

  if depth = 1

     | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 2 ->
         Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 4 ->
         Thresh

             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b', c') = f b in
    if c' = true then wwhile(f,b') else b'

  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) -> if (eval (s,x,y)) < (eval (t,x,y))

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 assoc
                 (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 23
                 "sample: assoc 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 assoc
                 (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 (-1)
                 "sample: assoc 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
                 [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
                 512 
                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g3 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 3 : manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c3 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 3 : manual"
    )] 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine u -> pi *. (eval (u, x, y))
  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)
      else eval (v, x, y);;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth = 1
  then (if (rand (0, 1)) = 0 then VarX else VarY)
  else
    (match rand (0, 4) with
     | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 2 ->
         Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 4 ->
         Thresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) = let rv = eval (e, x, y) in rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Average (x,y) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (x,y) -> (exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString a) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString b) ^
                 ("?" ^ ((exprToString c) ^ (":" ^ (exprToString d)))))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Printf.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let g1 () = (2, 47, 6);;

let _ = (fun ()  -> doRandomGray (g1 ())) ();;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

let rec wwhile (f,b) =

    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")

    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest

                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"

    (fun () -> mkTest

    )] 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine u -> pi *. (eval (u, x, y))
  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)
      else eval (v, x, y);;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth = 1
  then (if (rand (0, 1)) = 0 then VarX else VarY)
  else
    (match rand (0, 4) with
     | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 2 ->
         Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 4 ->
         Thresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) = let rv = eval (e, x, y) in rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Average (x,y) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (x,y) -> (exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString a) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString b) ^
                 ("?" ^ ((exprToString c) ^ (":" ^ (exprToString d)))))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Printf.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let g1 () = (2, 47, 6);;

let _ = (fun ()  -> doRandomGray (g1 ())) ();;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b', c') = f b in
    if c' = true then wwhile(f,b') else b'

let fixpoint (f,b) = wwhile ((fun b -> (f b, (f b) != b)) , b);;

let rec exprToString e = match e with

  | VarY -> "y"

  | Average (x,y) -> "(("  ^ exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (x,y) -> exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) -> "(" ^ exprToString a ^ "<" ^ exprToString b

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

    )] 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b', c') = f b in
    if c' = true then wwhile(f,b') else b'

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 assoc
                 (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 23
                 "sample: assoc 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 assoc
                 (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 (-1)
                 "sample: assoc 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
                 [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
                 512 
                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = match l with
  | []    -> d
  | h::t  -> if (fst h) = k then snd h else assoc (d, k, t);;

assoc
  (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b', c') = f b in
    if c' = true then wwhile(f,b') else b'


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let fixpoint (f,b) = wwhile ((fun b -> (f b, (f b) != b)) , b);;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y" 
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Average (x,y) -> "(("  ^ exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (x,y) -> exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) -> "(" ^ exprToString a ^ "<" ^ exprToString b 
                        ^ "?" ^ exprToString c ^ ":" ^ exprToString d

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let buildY()                       = VarY

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Cosine u ->  cos (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) +. (eval (v,x,y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) *. (eval (v,x,y)))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) -> if (eval (s,x,y)) < (eval (t,x,y)) 
      then eval (u,x,y) 
      else eval (v,x,y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

    emitGrayscale (f,n,name);;

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let removeDuplicates l =

          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest')

    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr

let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y" 
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Average (x,y) -> "(("  ^ exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (x,y) -> exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) -> "(" ^ exprToString a ^ "<" ^ exprToString b 
                        ^ "?" ^ exprToString c ^ ":" ^ exprToString d

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Cosine u ->  cos (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) +. (eval (v,x,y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) *. (eval (v,x,y)))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) -> if (eval (s,x,y)) < (eval (t,x,y)) 
      then eval (u,x,y) 
      else eval (v,x,y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand,depth) = 
  if depth = 1 then 
    if rand(0,1) = 0 then VarX
    else VarY
  else (*XXXXXXXXXXX*)
    match rand(0,4) with
      | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, depth-1))
      | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))
      | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))
      | 4 -> Thresh ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)), 
                     (build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Printf.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name);;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let max = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b', c') = f b in
    if c' = true then wwhile(f,b') else b'

let fixpoint (f,b) = wwhile ((fun b -> (f b, (f b) != b)) , b);;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y" 
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Average (x,y) -> "(("  ^ exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (x,y) -> exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) -> "(" ^ exprToString a ^ "<" ^ exprToString b 
                        ^ "?" ^ exprToString c ^ ":" ^ exprToString d

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Cosine u ->  cos (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) +. (eval (v,x,y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) *. (eval (v,x,y)))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) -> if (eval (s,x,y)) < (eval (t,x,y)) 
      then eval (u,x,y) 
      else eval (v,x,y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand,depth) = 
  if depth = 1 then 
    if rand(0,1) = 0 then VarX
    else VarY
  else (*XXXXXXXXXXX*)
    match rand(0,4) with
      | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, depth-1))
      | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))
      | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))
      | 4 -> Thresh ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)), 
                     (build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Printf.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name);;

  let _ =

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)
      else eval (v, x, y);;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth = 1
  then (if (rand (0, 1)) = 0 then VarX else VarY)
  else
    (match rand (0, 4) with
     | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 2 ->
         Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 4 ->
         Thresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y

  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)

  | h::t  -> if (fst h) = k then snd h else assoc (d, k, t);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

  let (b', c') = f b in

let fixpoint (f,b) = wwhile ((fun b -> (f b, (f b) != b)) , b);;

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y" 
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Average (x,y) -> "(("  ^ exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (x,y) -> exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) -> "(" ^ exprToString a ^ "<" ^ exprToString b 
                        ^ "?" ^ exprToString c ^ ":" ^ exprToString d

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Cosine u ->  cos (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) +. (eval (v,x,y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) *. (eval (v,x,y)))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) -> if (eval (s,x,y)) < (eval (t,x,y)) 
      then eval (u,x,y) 
      else eval (v,x,y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand,depth) = 
  if depth = 1 then 
    if rand(0,1) = 0 then VarX
    else VarY
  else (*XXXXXXXXXXX*)
    match rand(0,4) with
      | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, depth-1))
      | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))
      | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))
      | 4 -> Thresh ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)), 
                     (build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Printf.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name);;

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Average (x,y) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (x,y) -> (exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString a) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString b) ^
                 ("?" ^ ((exprToString c) ^ (":" ^ (exprToString d)))))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Printf.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let _ = (fun ()  -> doRandomGray (g1 ())) ();;

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)
      else eval (v, x, y);;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth = 1
  then (if (rand (0, 1)) = 0 then VarX else VarY)
  else
    (match rand (0, 4) with
     | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 2 ->
         Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 4 ->
         Thresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in

                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 assoc
                 (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 23
                 "sample: assoc 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 assoc
                 (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 (-1)
                 "sample: assoc 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
                 [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
                 512 
                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g3 ()))

                 ()
                 "sample: gray 3 : manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)
      else eval (v, x, y);;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in

  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =

  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

  match e with

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  let (b', c') = f b in
    if c' = true then wwhile(f,b') else b'

let fixpoint (f,b) = wwhile ((fun b -> (f b, (f b) != b)) , b);;

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = match e with 
  | VarX -> "x"
  | VarY -> "y" 
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString x ^ ")"
  | Average (x,y) -> "(("  ^ exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y ^ ")/2)"
  | Times (x,y) -> exprToString x ^ "*" ^ exprToString y
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) -> "(" ^ exprToString a ^ "<" ^ exprToString b 
                        ^ "?" ^ exprToString c ^ ":" ^ exprToString d

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = match e with 
  | VarX -> x
  | VarY -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Cosine u ->  cos (pi *. eval (u,x,y))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) +. (eval (v,x,y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> ((eval (u,x,y)) *. (eval (v,x,y)))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) -> if (eval (s,x,y)) < (eval (t,x,y)) 
      then eval (u,x,y) 
      else eval (v,x,y)

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand,depth) = 
  if depth = 1 then 
    if rand(0,2) = 0 then VarX
    else VarY
  else (*XXXXXXXXXXX*)
    match rand(0,5) with
      | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, depth-1))
      | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, depth-1))
      | 2 -> Average ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))
      | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))
      | 4 -> Thresh ((build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)), 
                     (build (rand, depth-1)), (build (rand, depth-1)))

      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Printf.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name);;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)
      else eval (v, x, y);;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth = 1
  then (if (rand (0, 2)) = 0 then VarX else VarY)
  else
    (match rand (0, 5) with
     | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 2 ->
         Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 4 ->
         Thresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Average (x,y) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (x,y) -> (exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString a) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString b) ^
                 ("?" ^ ((exprToString c) ^ (":" ^ (exprToString d)))))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine u -> sin (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Cosine u -> cos (pi *. (eval (u, x, y)))
  | Average (u,v) -> ((eval (u, x, y)) +. (eval (v, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (u,v) -> (eval (u, x, y)) *. (eval (v, x, y))
  | Thresh (s,t,u,v) ->
      if (eval (s, x, y)) < (eval (t, x, y))
      then eval (u, x, y)
      else eval (v, x, y);;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth = 1
  then (if (rand (0, 2)) = 0 then VarX else VarY)
  else
    (match rand (0, 5) with
     | 0 -> Sine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 1 -> Cosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 2 ->
         Average ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 3 -> Times ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 4 ->
         Thresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Printf.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine x -> "sin(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Cosine x -> "cos(pi*" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ")")
  | Average (x,y) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString y) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (x,y) -> (exprToString x) ^ ("*" ^ (exprToString y))
  | Thresh (a,b,c,d) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString a) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString b) ^
                 ("?" ^ ((exprToString c) ^ (":" ^ (exprToString d)))))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Printf.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let g1 () = (10, 999, 12);;

let _ = (fun ()  -> doRandomGray (g1 ())) ();;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if List.mem h seen then seen else h :: seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;
